about_the_game:
Game Overview
One day, the peaceful country of daughters was shrouded in a mysterious power, and all the women in the country were covered with evil mosaic. No one could recognize anyone anymore. In order to explore the truth behind it and restore the original appearance of the country of daughters, as the "first gentleman," you embark on a journey to save the girls from the fire and water with your ancestral treasures...

Features
It is a special elimination game with a unique game board. By collecting specified color balls, you can eliminate the mosaic on the girls' bodies and interact with the storyline to help the gentlemen gradually understand the truth behind it. Multiple girls with different attributes are waiting for you to encounter! ❤
Each character has multiple poses of liv2d animation! !
♥ CG gallery mode ♥

content_descriptors.notes: The girls in the game may be too sexy for children to watch oh!

name: Mosaic Girl Savior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

short_description: This is an elimination adventure game. Women's country was suddenly shrouded in a mysterious force, women were played on the Mosaic of evil, in order to explore the truth behind, restore the original appearance of women's country, as the "first gentleman" you embarked on a journey.
